body:
agent auth login - авторизация через Google не работает. Первые два варианта авторизации дают ссылку, которая не работает в браузере.

- Google AI Pro/Ultra (OAuth - Browser)
- Google AI Pro/Ultra (OAuth - Manual Code Entry)

Получаю сообщение в браузере:

~~~
Доступ заблокирован: ошибка авторизации
Unregistered scope(s) in the request: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/generative-language.tuning, https://www.googleapis.com/auth/generative-language.retriever
Если вы разработчик этого приложения, прочитайте
.
Ошибка 403: restricted_client
~~~

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5b115eb4-a1f3-4f62-8e85-774605d2c757)

comments.body:
We should look at how 

[reference-gemini-cli @ 26f050f](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli/tree/26f050ff10dd90a8c4e6e125effe79d0272aa474)
[reference-gemini-cookbook @ aa218e8](https://github.com/google-gemini/cookbook/tree/aa218e8c403f86f2d942f645f1e99ca8ed7f7080)

Are implemented and try to use code as close to it as possible.

Also may be https://github.com/sst/opencode/tree/0068cb305f617a99556289c72b8a5ddc2bbda746 has an answer on how to do it for Google?

Please download all logs and data related about the issue to this repository, make sure we compile that data to `./docs/case-studies/issue-{id}` folder, and use it to do deep case study analysis (also make sure to search online for additional facts and data), in which we will reconstruct timeline/sequence of events, find root causes of the problem, and propose possible solutions.

title: agent auth login через Google не работает
